name: MCTLive
0:
”Alexa, start m. c. t. live”
”Alexa, begin m. c. t. live”
”Alexa, launch m. c. t. live”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: m. c. t. live
Developer Terms of Use
des:
MCT (Mortgage Capital Trading) is a capital markets advisory firm focused on technology and service. MCT Live is a capital markets Software as a Service (SaaS) platform that provides MCT clients the ability to independently manage their pipeline risk and perform best execution analysis on their loan sales.

The MCTLive skill allows MCTLive users to connect to their MCTLive accounts via an Alexa enabled device, so they can perform MCTLive queries or execute MCTLive commands by voice. The MCTLive queries include but not limited for query MCTLive trades, investors, reports and files etc. The MCTLive commands include but not limited to add new tam trade, commence hedge advisor, load ready for sale, run best ex, etc. A full query and command list can be accessed by asking Alexa: "What are the supported commands?"

The MCTLive skill is for MCTLive users only, as such skill users must already have an active MCTLive account. The skill users must have Alexa device as well.

To get started, the skill users need to login to the MCTLive website (https://www.mctlive.com) and link their Amazon account by clicking on the "Login with Amazon" button. Then, when the Amazon OAuth popup window shows up, users will need to enter their Amazon username and password, and then authorize MCTLive to use their Amazon user id. Once this is complete, the user will launch the MCTLive skill from Alexa device, and perform the account link from the Alexa device by following the Alexa account linking instructions.
